description: A Russian artist defends her marriage to Peter Madsen, jailed for murdering journalist Kim Wall.
title: Peter Madsen: Russian artist marries Danish submarine killer
title_page: Peter Madsen: Russian artist marries Danish submarine killer - BBC News
maintext: In a post on Sunday, Ms Curpen wrote: "My husband committed a horrible crime and he is punished for that. However, knowing him for real give me an exclusive right to say that I am lucky to be with the most beautiful, smart, talented, devoted and empathetic person and man ever.
